article_metadata.title_en: Timeline: All the Transformations and Turning Points in the Trade War Between China and the United States
article_metadata.text_summary_en: The trade war between China and the United States is escalating, with no signs of easing after the two largest economies in the world exchanged massive tariffs this week. Beijing raised tariffs on American imports to 125%, just one day after the White House announced that Chinese imports would be subject to tariffs of at least 145%. The article presents a timeline summarizing the intense discussions between the US and China, highlighting the key events and turning points that led to the current situation. The article expresses concern about the potential future trajectory of the trade war.
